Josh Hawley: s book deal with publisher Simon & Schuster was terminated due to his role in the Capitol insurrection.
Hawley: s book, titled "The Tyranny of Big Tech," was subsequently picked up by conservative publisher Regnery.
A fabricated version of Hawley: s book cover, titled "Spineless Traitor," circulated on social media, implying his guilt in inciting the insurrection.
The Good Liars of NYC: a comedy account known for pranks on public figures, created the satirical version of Hawley's book cover.
